productsList.title: AI OpenChat - powered by GPT5 models
productsList.description:
Our AI-powered app integrates the latest GPT-4o, GPT-4o1, and Claude Sonnet 3 models to deliver a seamless, intelligent chat experience. 
Requirement: .Net Desktop Runtime should be install in order to run this app. 
Designed for productivity, the app offers auto-summarization and information querying directly from your selected document files (support PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text...), making it easy to access insights and summaries in seconds. 
Perfect for students, professionals, and researchers, this app enhances document comprehension and boosts productivity with cutting-edge AI capabilities.
Our app is designed with your privacy in mind: all chat conversations are stored locally on your computer, ensuring that none of your personal data is uploaded or stored on the internet.
With an easy-to-use interface, this desktop app is perfect for anyone looking to integrate AI into their daily tasks without the concern of online data sharing.
The free version of this app includes limited access to the GPT-4.1-mini and GPT-4.0-mini models. To use the more advanced GPT-4.0 models, Calude Sonnet 3.7 model or Chat with PDF features, please upgrade to the PRO version. 

Important: AI-Generated Content

All AI-generated content belongs to the respective AI service provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.). The ownership, usage rights, and terms of service are governed by the provider you choose to use.

Disclaimer 1 : We are not responsible for any content generated by the AI models. The accuracy, appropriateness, and legality of AI-generated content are the responsibility of the AI service provider and the user.
Disclaimer 2: This application is not affiliated with OpenAI and operates independently, providing a local instance of AI-powered conversations without external data storage.
We‚Äôve added an option to report AI-generated output directly from the Privacy Policy window. To report inappropriate content, open the Privacy Policy using the button at the bottom left, scroll to the end, and click the email address to send us your report.

productsList.title: Chatotron
productsList.description:
Explore the latest updates of Chatotron, your definitive Windows application for interacting with ChatGPT, OpenAI's artificial intelligence assistant. Now, enjoy an even more personalized and efficient chatbot experience right from your desktop.

With Chatotron, you can:

- **Interact in Multiple Languages**: Utilize Chatotron in your preferred language, opening up a world of accessibility. Perfect for those seeking a multilingual GPT chat assistant.

- **Interact with Documents and URLs**: Transform the way you handle documents and web content. Chatotron now allows you to "converse" with your PDFs, Word documents, text files and web pages, creating a unique interaction experience. This feature will be continuously enhanced in future updates. Ideal for those desiring a Chat GPT user interface that handles documents and URLs.

- **Experience Enhanced Security**: Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your documents and URLs are handled locally, removing the need to upload them to third-party sites. A key aspect for those who value security in a GPT chat assistant.

- **Enjoy Greater Stability**: With our meticulous bug fixes and stability enhancements, expect a smoother, hassle-free experience.

Chatotron provides ultra-fast response times and quick access to commands, outpacing other Chat GPT interfaces in speed and efficiency. With quick keys, organized chat groups, and custom character creation, you can interact with ChatGPT like never before.

Customize your ChatGPT experience even further. Create different personalities for Chat GPT to adapt to, adding more depth to your dialogues. Use Chatotron's customizable quick keys for swift and efficient access. Save time with quick commands for prompts and repetitive phrases, maximizing your chat efficiency.

Keep your chats organized and easily identifiable with group chats and color coding. Experience the power of Chatotron, the ultimate tool for efficient, personalized, and secure chats. Try Chatotron today and discover a new level of interaction with ChatGPT right from your own operating system.

**An OpenAI API Key (either free or paid) is required to use Chatotron.**
** You can get it here: https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys **

productsList.title: Just Checking
productsList.description:
Just Checking is a checkbook software app that will help manage your checkbook. Enter transactions, mark them cleared, and compare the balance to your statements to reconcile. Print checks using predefined templates. Use the built-in check template editor to make changes if necessary.

Manages multiple checking accounts.
Calculates actual and bank balances for each transaction.
Split transactions.
Supports multiple users.
Password protect your files.
Check printing.
Multi-Level sorting. Ascending and Descending sorting.
Disable sorting and move transactions to match your statement.
Advanced filtering.
Edit check templates.
Reports for checkbook register, payees, memos, splits.
Payee, Memo, Split reports for totals, details, summary grouped by income and expenses.
Custom Pay Types
Import data exported from your bank: ofc, ofx, qif, qfx, csv
Set up reoccurring transactions.
Backup and Restore database.
Customize font and color.
Mark transactions for tax records.
Updated help file with pictures.
Search dialog with highlighting
Note fields specific to each transaction.
High DPI support. Works great on 4K too!

Our app is specifically designed to provide you with a hassle-free experience, making it easy for you to access high-quality video content from YouTube. One Click Tube Downloader - HD offers a simple and user-friendly interface for downloading YouTube videos. With just one click, you can initiate video downloads. No complicated procedures or steps ‚Äì just a simple tap to quickly acquire the high-definition videos you desire from YouTube.

2. High-Definition YouTube Video Quality:
Our app is dedicated to providing you with high-definition video downloads from YouTube, ensuring an immersive viewing experience. Whether it's captivating movies, hilarious short clips, or heartwarming music videos from YouTube, everything will be presented in crisp high-definition quality.

3. Security and Privacy Protection:
We highly value your privacy and have implemented strict security measures to safeguard your personal information while using the app to download YouTube videos. Feel confident while downloading videos with One Click Tube Downloader - HD, knowing that your data is secure.

4. Regular Updates:
To ensure the best user experience and to keep up with the latest changes on YouTube, One Click Tube Downloader - HD receives regular updates, optimizing its features and ensuring compatibility with YouTube's updates. You'll always have access to the latest download capabilities and enhancements.

Conclusion:
Experience the ultimate convenience of high-definition video downloads from YouTube with One Click Tube Downloader - HD. Enjoy a visual feast of top-notch quality, courtesy of our app, as you effortlessly download your favorite YouTube videos and savor high-definition content wherever and whenever you desire.

Note for Users:

Free Users:
1. Upon registration, receive 3 credits as a gift to download YouTube videos.
2. Credits will be consumed every time a YouTube video is downloaded.
3. After the credits are depleted, you can subscribe to continue using the app for YouTube video downloads.

productsList.title: 1890CursoMecaNet.CursoMecaNet.FS
productsList.description:
The best typing course in Spanish language.

CursoMecaNet is a complete free typing course in Spanish that will teach us to write in the fastest and safest way possible. This software for PC allows you to acquire greater speed to write texts without looking at the computer keyboard.

The Full Screen version is designed with simplified menus to be easily used by the youngest or in typing classrooms.

It is organized in 20 lessons, with indications of the position and movement of the fingers, a large number of typing exercises and various typing games.

It allows to save and upload to different users all the information of the development of each lesson.

This Full Screen version of CursoMecaNet is a program that allows you to learn to type on the computer keyboard without looking, using the ten fingers. This way you can reach between 250 and 300 beats per minute.
CursoMecaNet is completely free, it does not have an expiration date and it contains the complete texts of its multiple lessons and exams.

This course contains a large number of lessons, organized in a progressive way of difficulty, introducing little by little the different keys and explanations of how we should place our hands on the keyboard and which finger each key should press, in this way we will learn to write without having to look at the keyboard of your computer. Contains in addition to the numerous lessons, several typing games, to practice in a more enjoyable way what has been learned.

MecaNet develops a pedagogical method of learning with which every lesson uses everything that has been learned in the previous lessons, while adding new keys. In this way, the acquired skills are consolidated while new ones are learned.

We advise that the work sessions are not excessively long, from 20 to 25 minutes a day, for 4 days a week. In this way, in two or three months you will write correctly and you will have reached an optimal level of beats per minute. It is essential to emphasize that during the first weeks of learning, we must focus our attention on the correctness of writing, that is, not make mistakes while writing, although this makes us slow down. The speed will be achieved naturally as you progress through the lessons with practice.

Learning to type is a skill that requires several weeks (or even months) to master, while almost all other computer applications can be learned quickly "at work" when we enter the world of work. That's why it's important that when the time comes we have this skill acquired. It is advisable to learn as a child or young person before developing bad habits typing with the keyboard (type with two fingers) since when this happens, it is difficult to correct.
